name: Candy Platformer
description:
(Game Asset is included (unitypackage))

Adventure of candy with name "Guy". The humans have eaten his friend Morty who was his neighbor in the store where they lived. This game looks like an animated movie "Sausage Party". Here you will be able to see mystic life of foods and candies!!!

This game created by "Solution studio" and "Bitboys inc", you also can use our assets.

If you have any questions or suggestions - yusuf.fakhriddinov@gmail.com.

Thanks for your attention!!!
